clear-day.text: It’s a sunny day, why not have a picnic in the shade, remember your sun cream!
Time to go to the park and have a nice picnic, maybe go for a bear hunt!
It’s sunny and warm outside, why not go and hunt an ice cream van, but don’t get too hot!
With the sun beaming down so hot: I scream, you scream we all scream for ice cream.
The suns out and the skies are clear, are there any outdoor swimming pools near you?

clear-night.text: It’s bedtime you know, go to sleep for another fun filled day.
Lights out for another day, get some sleep so you have the well rested status applied tomorrow
If you are not quite asleep, try reading a bit.
There are many books on your shelf to read and then fall asleep reading.

partly-cloudy-day.text: There are a few clouds out, why not play some sports? Football, tennis, basketball are all fun to play, but play safe and play fair.
While there are a few clouds, why not take a hike in the countryside?
There is a bit of clouds, why not organising some running races? Last to the finish is the slowest!

partly-cloudy-night.text: It’s bedtime you know, go to sleep for another fun filled day.
Lights out for another day, get some sleep so you have the well rested status applied tomorrow
If you are not quite asleep, try reading a bit.
There are many books on your shelf to read and then fall asleep reading.

cloudy.text: It’s cloudy at the moment, you could go to the local library to stock up on good books to read in case it rains.
Why not go to the shops to pick up your favorite things? Remember to not spend too much.
Just because the sun isn’t out isn’t an excuse to not walk the dogs, make sure you clean up after them.
With a bit of cloud cover, why not go for a bit of a jog?

rain.text: It’s raining outside, as you can’t enjoy the outdoors why not get some chores done, so you can enjoy it all you want when the weather gets better.
It’s raining, it’s pouring, the old man is snoring, (0xE2 0x99 0xAA - unicode hex). Why not sing some songs or make some music to brighten the mood?
As the weather is so bad outside why not stay in and play video games?
With the rain hammering down why not make some delicious baked goods?

sleet.text: It’s hail outside, as you can’t enjoy the outdoors why not get some chores done, so you can enjoy it all you want when the weather gets better.
This is the worst kind of weather, nothing to do but wait it out and maybe debug your code?
As the weather is so bad outside why not stay in and play video games?
With the sleet hammering down why not make some delicious baked goods?

snow.text: It’s snowing outside, the ground is white! Why not have a nice snowball fight with your friends? Wear a thick coat and gloves to say warm.
There is a snow on the floor, go find a hill and get sledging all day long! Wear a thick coat and gloves to say warm.

fog.text: There is a fog in the air at the moment, please be careful to not wander and get lost today.

wind.text: The wind is strong today, perfect for kite flying!
